qa_list.question: Who can make a reservation for facility use on campus?
qa_list.answer: Only Carnegie Mellon community members may make a reservation for facility use on campus.

qa_list.question: What is required to check in at the desk and scan ID?
qa_list.answer: You must have a valid CMU ID

qa_list.question: Who should you contact if you want to reserve outdoor field space?
qa_list.answer: View outdoor field space availability and please contact Jarrod Novotny or Sara Gauntner.

qa_list.question: What opportunities are available for members of the University community regarding athletic facilities?
qa_list.answer: Members of the University community have the opportunity to inquire about athletic facilities for reserved or approved events.

qa_list.question: Who should you contact if you have any questions about reservations?
qa_list.answer: If you have any questions, please contact Associate Director of Athletics, Sara Gauntner .

qa_list.question: What happens to facility hours during semester breaks and holidays?
qa_list.answer: Facility hours change during semester breaks and holidays. Please be sure to visit our facility hours page for updates prior to coming to campus.

qa_list.question: Who should you contact if you are an outside requester who wants to make a reservation?
qa_list.answer: For outside requests, please contact Associate Director of Athletics, Sara Gauntner,

qa_list.question: What is the phone number for Associate Director of Athletics, Sara Gauntner?
How do you confirm a reservation?
qa_list.answer: All reservations are NOT FINAL until an email confirmation is received from Sara Gauntner.

doc_text:
Must have a valid CMU ID to use any space

Court and Fitness Reservations

Only Carnegie Mellon community members may make a reservation for facility use on campus. You must have a valid CMU ID and must check in at the desk and scan ID.

Reserve a Tennis Court - opens in new window

Outdoor Space Availability

View outdoor field space availability and please contact Jarrod Novotny or Sara Gauntner to reserve outdoor field space.

Reservation Opportunities

Members of the University community have the opportunity to inquire about athletic facilities for reserved or approved events. All requests will be reviewed by and approved at the discretion of the Athletic Department Staff. If you have any questions, please contact Associate Director of Athletics, Sara Gauntner .

Facility hours change during semester breaks and holidays. Please be sure to visit our

facility hours page for updates prior to coming to campus.

Reservations are limited to the Carnegie Mellon community. For outside requests, please contact Associate Director of Athletics, Sara Gauntner,

(412) 268-7030.

(412) 268-7030.

All reservations are NOT FINAL until an email confirmation is received from Sara Gauntner. The athletics department has the right to cancel or change a reservation at any time.
